response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value to us and is worth $12,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I would like to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 11000}
